snippet: Exactly 50 years after Dodger Stadium opened, Andre Ethier homered in the eighth inning to send Los Angeles to a 2-1 victory over Pittsburgh in the Dodgers’ home opener.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers defeat Pittsburgh Pirates, 2-1; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Exactly 50 years after Dodger Stadium opened, Andre Ethier homered in the eighth inning to send Los Angeles to a 2-1 victory over Pittsburgh in the Dodgers’ home opener.

headline.seo: Ethier’s Homer Sends Dodgers Over Pirates on 50th Anniversary of Dodgers Stadium
headline.main: Ethier’s Home Run Seals Win, Extending Dodgers’ Celebration
headline.print_headline: Ethier’s Home Run Seals Win, Extending Dodgers’ Celebration
